com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client
Enum RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode>
      com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode>
Enclosing class:
RhizosphereOptions<T>
public static enum RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode
extends java.lang.Enum<RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode>

Enumeration of selection modes that the Rhizosphere visualization allows.

Enum Constant Summary
ALL
          All supported selection modes are allowed.
BOX
          Only box selection by drawing selection boxes in the visualization viewport is allowed.
CLICK
          Only model selection by clicking on model renderings (or other UI elements that allow click-based selection, like layout headers) is allowed.
NONE
          No selection gestures are allowed on the visualization.
 
Method Summary

          Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
static RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode[] values()
          Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

Enum Constant Detail

NONE

public static final RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode NONE
No selection gestures are allowed on the visualization.

CLICK

public static final RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode CLICK
Only model selection by clicking on model renderings (or other UI elements that allow click-based selection, like layout headers) is allowed.

BOX

public static final RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode BOX
Only box selection by drawing selection boxes in the visualization viewport is allowed.

ALL

public static final RhizosphereOptions.SelectionMode ALL
All supported selection modes are allowed.
